tools.name: compute_portfolio_risk_basic
tools.description: Compute basic portfolio risk metrics (returns, volatility, drawdown, concentrations).

tools.name: compute_correlation_matrix
tools.description: Build a correlation matrix of daily returns for the provided tickers and date range.

tools.name: issuer_peers_compare
tools.description: Compare an issuer against peers using key fundamental and market metrics. Returns base issuer metrics, peer list with comparable data, ranking by P/E, EV/EBITDA, ROE, Debt/EBITDA, dividend yield, and heuristic flags (overvalued/undervalued, high_leverage, etc.).

tools.name: suggest_rebalance
tools.description: Generate deterministic rebalance proposal for a portfolio based on risk profile constraints (asset class limits, concentration limits, turnover limits).

tools.name: build_cfo_liquidity_report
tools.description: Build a CFO-oriented liquidity and resilience report. Includes liquidity profile by buckets, duration, currency exposure, concentrations, stress scenarios with covenant checks, recommendations and executive summary.
